messages.subject: New story in files
messages.msgSnippet: The moment no one has been waiting for----I ve uploaded my RK fic THe Wolf s Lady to the files. It s a glimpse of Saitou s life following the Kyoto Arc as told
messages.messageBody:
The moment no one has been waiting for----I've uploaded my RK fic THe
Wolf's Lady to the files. It's a glimpse of Saitou's life following the
Kyoto Arc as told mainly from his wife's pov. I hope you'll give it a look.


--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
